item.title: Use ChatGPT for Twitter Marketing
item.description: Overview This post covers how to use AI tools like ChatGPT and Keywords Everywhere to generate Twitter content for marketing purposes. We’ll go over templates for creating engaging Twitter threads, bios, converting articles to threads, responding to customers, generating hashtags and content calendars.
